name: Krypton Raiders
overview: His feet slipped on the hard rock, a cold sweat crossed his face, in front of him was the grotto of the planet "Krypton". He knew what This meant, going into a hostile world where the laser weapon did not I had to stop acting. But her mind was calm, and she remembered perfectly mission, collect the four diamonds symbol of your world and reach the helicopter to flee as soon as possible. Do not hesitate, jump into the adventure and ... GOOD LUCK !!!
